data.actual_result: The [ BOT ] tags have different colors. The on with the role shows as a greyish blue.
data.expected_result: The [ BOT ] tags should be the same color regardless of their roles.
data.short_description: When offline the blue [BOT] tag changes based if it has a role or not.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get two offline bots - Give one a role. (the color I used was #6FE29D)
